H0.text: What is another name for the alligator pear. Persea

H1.text: What is another name for the alligator pear. Guacamo

H2.text: What is another name for the alligator pear. Palta

H3.text: What is another name for the alligator pear. Avacado

A4.text: In South American Spanish-speaking countries, it is known as palta.

A5.text: The avocado, alligator pear or avocado pear (Persea americana) is an evergreen tree in the laurel family (Lauraceae).

A6.text: Palta, avocado in South American Spanish
